name: Shining Mewtwo
rules: You can't have more than 1 Shining Mewtwo in your deck.

attacks.name: Reflect Shield
attacks.text: If an attack does damage to Shining Mewtwo during your opponent's next turn (even if Shining Mewtwo is Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Shining Mewtwo from that attack (any other effects of attacks still happen) and do 20 damage to the attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psyburst
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Shining Mewtwo or this attack does nothing. This attack does 40 damage plus 10 damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

flavorText: It uses its highly developed psychic powers to defeat its enemies before they even have time to think.
